description.value: At 15th level, you can create a savage winter storm centered on you. This power acts as @Compendium[pf1.spells.g9koefk7x9szoheo]{Control Winds}, but in addition the entire area (not including the “eye” at the center of the storm) is affected as a @Compendium[pf1.spells.qnp4eosajai8s3sf]{Sleet Storm} and all in the area are exposed to extreme cold. You may use this ability once per day.
